translation.en: The winner is...
translation.zh: 得奖人是…

translation.en: And the winner is...
translation.zh: 得奖人是…

translation.en: George Stevens!
translation.zh: 乔治史蒂文斯！

translation.en: William Wyler.
translation.zh: 威廉惠勒

translation.en: John Huston.
translation.zh: 约翰休斯顿

translation.en: John Ford.
translation.zh: 约翰福特

translation.en: Mr. Frank Capra.
translation.zh: 弗兰克卡普拉先生

translation.en: I discovered Frank Capra, like most people in my generation,
translation.zh: 我和同时代大多数人一样 是通过… （吉尔摩德尔托罗 导演）

translation.en: through It's a Wonderful Life.
translation.zh:
…《生活多美好》
认识弗兰克卡普拉的

translation.en: Capra is a master at constructing emotion,
translation.zh: 卡普拉是从结构上

translation.en: structurally, into a film.
translation.zh: 在电影中构建情感的大师

translation.en: I think I have cried more in Frank Capra films,
translation.zh: 我觉得我看弗兰克卡普拉的电影

translation.en: and I have stopped thinking more in Frank Capra films,
translation.zh: 比看其他导演的作品哭得更惨

translation.en: than in any other filmmaker's work.
translation.zh: 也不再想那么多

translation.en: [Steven Spielberg] I don't really think that William Wyler saw himself as an artist.
translation.zh:
我认为威廉惠勒
没有把自己视作艺术家

translation.en: When he set up the camera, he didn't set up the camera
translation.zh: 当他在架摄影机时… （史蒂文斯皮尔伯格 导演） …他架摄影机不是为了

translation.en: to be told how extraordinary his angle and compositions were.
translation.zh: 让大家知道他的角度或构图有多杰出

translation.en: He set up the camera in such a way to help tell the story better.
translation.zh:
他架摄影机的方式
是为了将故事描述得更好

translation.en: And then having met him, I think it was the late '60s,
translation.zh:
然后见了他后
我想那是在1960年代晚期

translation.en: I so admired that he was somebody that had wielded so much power and authority
translation.zh:
我对他深感敬佩
拥有那么高的权力和影响力

translation.en: and was at the top of his game,
translation.zh: 并且是个中翘楚

translation.en: and won three Academy Awards for Best Director,
translation.zh: 还赢得三座奥斯卡最佳导演奖

translation.en: who was still gracious and kind.
translation.zh: 却依然和蔼可亲

translation.en: [Francis Ford Coppola] I was drawn to John Huston.
translation.zh: 我深受约翰休斯顿吸引

translation.en: There's a lot of comparison between Huston and Hemingway
translation.zh: 许多人拿休斯顿和海明威比较 （弗朗西斯福特科波拉 导演）

translation.en: because Hemingway had that type of masculine derring-do.
translation.zh:
因为海明威拥有那种
勇往直前的男子气概

translation.en: But despite his irascible personal character and personal life,
translation.zh: 尽管休斯顿性格易怒 私生活也混乱

translation.en: Huston had this extraordinary intelligence.
translation.zh: 但他拥有非凡的智慧

translation.en: He made many, many, many films, and among them, some truly great ones.
translation.zh:
他执导过许多电影
当中有些真的非常棒

translation.en: [Paul Greengrass] The first time I can remember watching John Ford movies
translation.zh: 我还记得第一次看约翰福特的电影

translation.en: was film club at school.
translation.zh: 是在学校的电影社团看的

translation.en: Ford, by then, had this sort of bifurcated reputation.
translation.zh: （保罗格林格拉斯 导演） 福特当时的名声很两极

translation.en: On the one hand, he was a controversial arch-conservative figure.
translation.zh:
一方面来说 他是备受争议的
极端保守派人士

translation.en: On the other hand...
translation.zh: 另一方面…

translation.en: Hold it!
translation.zh: 等一下！

translation.en: ...he was at that point being revered, as he rightly is,
translation.zh: 他同时也深受尊敬

translation.en: as the great auteur and master of American cinema.
translation.zh: 是当之无愧的美国电影导演和大师

translation.en: [Lawrence Kasdan] George Stevens' facility with dramas, comedy,
translation.zh: 乔治史蒂文斯在戏剧、喜剧和音乐剧

translation.en: musicals, was unique.
translation.zh: 这几个方面的才能很独特

translation.en: He was not drawn to that which came easily to him.
translation.zh: 他对于容易的事不感兴趣

translation.en: He wanted to challenge himself all the time.
translation.zh: 他总是想挑战自己

translation.en: Those five filmmakers happened to be in that place then,
translation.zh: 这五位导演恰好面临了

translation.en: when the greatest conflict of all came knocking.
translation.zh: 史上最重要的冲突爆发的时期

translation.en: Cinema, in its purest form, could be put in the service of propaganda.
translation.zh:
电影单纯以形式而论
可能被当做宣传道具

translation.en: Hitler and Goebbels understood the power of the cinema
translation.zh: 希特勒和戈培尔知道电影的力量

translation.en: to move large populations towards your way of thinking.
translation.zh:
能将许多人的思维
带向你所想要的方向

translation.en: [Kasdan] All five of them were willing to turn away
translation.zh: 他们五人都愿意

translation.en: from a very comfortable life and serve their country
translation.zh: 离开原本舒适的生活 以自己能想到的最佳方式效忠国家

translation.en: in the best way they thought they could.
translation.zh: 以自己能想到的最佳方式效忠国家

translation.en: And to go out into the world, where there was no script,
translation.zh: 他们走向全世界 在那里没有剧本

translation.en: and there was no third act that anybody wrote
translation.zh: 也没有任何人写的

translation.en: where you knew you would come out of it safely.
translation.zh: 你知道定能全身而退的第三幕

translation.en: [Guillermo del Toro] Each of them participate on an epic scale
translation.zh: 他们每人都在全世界目睹过的

translation.en: in the grandest interventions
translation.zh: 最大型战争中

translation.en: in the largest war the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: 以极大的规模 参与干预行动

translation.en: [Spielberg] These documentaries that the five filmmakers made
translation.zh: 这五位制片人所制作的纪录片

translation.en: were powerful for American audiences.
translation.zh: 对美国观众非常有影响力

translation.en: I do think all five of them paid a very personal price.
translation.zh:
我确实认为他们五人
做出了许多自我牺牲

translation.en: These filmmakers that came back with footage about the truth of that war...
translation.zh:
这些带回了
关于战争真相影像的导演

translation.en: were changed forever.
translation.zh: 他们的生命被永远改变

translation.en: [Kasdan] The group of directors that we're talking about...
translation.zh: 我们谈论的这群导演

translation.en: were part of the first wave.
translation.zh: 是第一波人员

translation.en: They were creating the art form.
translation.zh: 他们在创造艺术形式

translation.en: [Spielberg] Film was an intoxicant
translation.zh: 打从无声电影出现的第一天开始

translation.en: from the very first days of the silent movies.
translation.zh: 电影就是令人陶醉的事物

translation.en: And I think early, early on,
translation.zh: 我认为在很早期的时候

translation.en: Hollywood realized they had a tremendous tool,
translation.zh: 好莱坞就知道他们拥有很棒的工具

translation.en: or even a weapon, for change, through cinema.
translation.zh: 甚至是武器 即通过电影寻求改变

translation.en: [narrator] By the late 1930s,
translation.zh: 在20世纪30年代晚期

translation.en: moviegoing had become an essential part of American culture.
translation.zh: 看电影已成为美国文化重要的一部分

translation.en: More than half the adult population went to the movies at least once a week,
translation.zh:
超过一半的成年人
每周至少会去看一次电影

translation.en: and before every film theaters played newsreels,
translation.zh: 电影院在播放电影前会播放新闻片段

translation.en: which were the only source of visual news at the time.
translation.zh:
在当时
那是观看新闻影像的唯一渠道

translation.en: [man] Power to the nth power,
translation.zh: 集所有权力于一身

translation.en: proclaimed by Hitler at the Nuremberg Nazi Congress.
translation.zh: 由希特勒在纽伦堡纳粹大会中宣布

translation.en: The Nazi Party above the state, and he above the Nazi Party,
translation.zh:
纳粹党在国家之上
而他在纳粹党之上

translation.en: affirmed by thundering cheers.
translation.zh: 民众欢声雷动

translation.en: [narrator] In the early years of Hitler's rise,
translation.zh: 在希特勒崛起的早期

translation.en: Hollywood paid little attention.
translation.zh: 好莱坞很少关注此事

translation.en: In movies, there was no Fuehrer. There were no Nazis.
translation.zh:
电影中没出现过元首
也没出现过纳粹

translation.en: [Greengrass] Ford was very early to see the threat that Nazi Germany posed.
translation.zh:
（纳粹威胁美国精神） 福特很早就看到
纳粹德国所带来的威胁

translation.en: [narrator] Twenty years earlier, when the US entered the First World War,
translation.zh:
在20年前
当美国参加第一次世界大战时

translation.en: John Ford was 22 and just starting out as a director.
translation.zh:
约翰福特正值22岁
并才刚开始踏入导演一行

translation.en: Ford not serving in World War I...
translation.zh: 福特没有参加第一次世界大战

translation.en: affected him very, very deeply,
translation.zh: （《一门四子》约翰福特） 这对他影响颇深

translation.en: and Four Sons was an attempt to explore the cost of that war.
translation.zh:
而《一门四子》
是他探讨战争代价的第一次尝试

translation.en: What it was was the beginning of Ford
translation.zh: 那部电影是福特

translation.en: trying to address reality.
translation.zh: 试图讲述现实的开始

translation.en: Ford, the man, was a figure of patrician authority
translation.zh: 福特这个人是权威显贵的代表人物

translation.en: who believed in duty and tradition, and evoked them wonderfully.
translation.zh:
他相信责任和传统
并且展现得淋漓尽致

translation.en: He was a man who sought solace in alcohol,
translation.zh: 他是个从酒精中寻求慰藉

translation.en: and had a rebel soul,
translation.zh: 并拥有叛逆灵魂的人

translation.en: and was proud of his Irish rebel heritage.
translation.zh: 他对自己爱尔兰叛逆的血统感到自豪

translation.en: I'm very courteous to my equals.
translation.zh: 我对平辈非常有礼貌

translation.en: More than courteous to my inferiors.
translation.zh: 我对下属更有礼貌

translation.en: I'm speaking in terms of pictures.
translation.zh: 我是指在电影业来说

translation.en: And I'm horribly rude to my superiors, so-called.
translation.zh: 但我对所谓的上司则是无礼到不行

translation.en: [narrator] Like Ford, John Huston was already aware of the looming threat in Europe.
translation.zh:
像福特一样 约翰休斯顿
也注意到欧洲迫在眉睫的威胁

translation.en: He had recently returned to Hollywood after some time in England.
translation.zh:
他刚在英国待过一段时间
于最近回到了好莱坞

translation.en: [John Huston] In London, when I was about 25 years old,
translation.zh: 在伦敦时 我大约25岁

translation.en: a whole series of circumstances mounted up
translation.zh: 在一系列事件的影响下 我最后终于破产

translation.en: to my finally being completely broke.
translation.zh: 我最后终于破产

translation.en: I could've called to my father for help, or friends.
translation.zh: 我原本能请求爸爸或朋友的帮助

translation.en: But I'm enough of a believer in the gambler's creed,
translation.zh: 不过我相信赌徒的教条

translation.en: that if you're in a bad streak, there's nothing to do about it.
translation.zh: 如果你恶运连连 你也无能为力

translation.en: You've just got to play it out.
translation.zh: 你只能顺其自然

translation.en: [Coppola] John Huston was the son of Walter Huston,
translation.zh: 约翰休斯顿是当红演员

translation.en: who was an important actor,
translation.zh: 华特休斯顿的儿子

translation.en: and he got to learn about acting, and, of course, learned from his father.
translation.zh:
他理所当然地
从他爸爸身上学习如何演戏

translation.en: I just had only admiration for John Huston.
translation.zh: 我对约翰休斯顿有的只是钦佩

translation.en: He's done a lot of things that pirates do.
translation.zh: 他做了许多海盗会做的事

translation.en: You know, he'd had a fight with Errol Flynn over Olivia de Havilland.
translation.zh:
他为了奥莉薇亚德哈维兰
和艾罗尔弗林大打出手

translation.en: Oh, that I could've had a fight with Errol Flynn over Olivia de Havilland.
translation.zh:
我也希望能为了奥莉薇亚德哈维兰
和艾罗尔弗林打架

translation.en: [Huston] Errol said, "Do you want to make anything of it?"
translation.zh: 艾罗尔说：“你想来真的吗？”

translation.en: And... I said, "Yes."
translation.zh: 然后…我说要

translation.en: We weren't friends then.
translation.zh: 我们那时还不是朋友

translation.en: There's no better way to get friends with a man than to have a fight with him.
translation.zh:
没什么比跟一个人打架
来结识朋友更好的方法

translation.en: [Coppola] Huston had many marriages,
translation.zh: 休斯顿有过许多次婚姻

translation.en: and many, in between the marriages, episodes with women,
translation.zh: 在多次婚姻之间还和其他女人有关系

translation.en: and was obviously very attractive to women,
translation.zh: 他显然深受女人欢迎

translation.en: and was very attracted to women.
translation.zh: 而他也对女人非常着迷

translation.en: Despite his bad-boy behavior throughout this period,
translation.zh:
尽管他在这时期
展现出各种坏男孩行为

translation.en: Huston, as a writer, had this conceptual mind
translation.zh: 休斯顿作为编剧 他的头脑很有概念

translation.en: and had really begun to attract the attention of people
translation.zh: 而他的剧本真的开始吸引到

translation.en: for his screenwriting work.
translation.zh: 大众的注意

translation.en: [man] The end of a nation.
translation.zh: 一个国家的终结

translation.en: World in alarm at the peril of war.
translation.zh: （德国吞并奥地利共和国） 世界处在战争危险的恐惧中

translation.en: What will come next? Czechoslovakia?
translation.zh: 接下来呢？是捷克斯洛伐克吗？

translation.en: When will Nazi aggression end?
translation.zh: 纳粹的侵略何时会结束？

translation.en: The democratic nations draw together against the ambitions of the dictators.
translation.zh: 民主国家齐心协力反对独裁者的野心

translation.en: [narrator] Huston was hired by Warner Bros. to co-write the historical drama Juarez.
translation.zh:
休斯顿受华纳兄弟雇用
共同写下历史剧《锦绣山河》

translation.en: He turned the script into a pointed anti-Hitler allegory.
translation.zh: 他将剧本变成反希特勒的寓言

translation.en: Democracy: The rule of the cattle, by the cattle, for the cattle.
translation.zh: 民主是靠牛有、牛治、牛享

translation.en: [narrator] But when the production started, he faced the tyranny of a movie star.
translation.zh:
但当电影开始拍摄后
他面临了电影明星的蛮横行为

translation.en: Paul Muni felt his part was too small
translation.zh: 保罗穆尼觉得自己戏份太少

translation.en: and had his brother-in-law rewrite the script.
translation.zh: 并叫他的亲戚重写剧本

translation.en: Only a little of Huston's work remained.
translation.zh: 休斯顿的原作只保留了一点点

translation.en: [Huston] The lot of the writer in Hollywood at that time
translation.zh: 在当时好莱坞有许多编剧

translation.en: was rather dismal.
translation.zh: 都相当郁闷

translation.en: One would write what one thought were good pictures,
translation.zh: 编剧写出了好剧本

translation.en: and they would be changed when they got to the screen
translation.zh: 不过电影开拍后 剧本又会遭到修改

translation.en: and become bad pictures.
translation.zh: 然后变成烂电影

translation.en: [narrator] Huston decided the only way he could exert control over his work
translation.zh: 休斯顿认为唯一能掌控他作品的办法

translation.en: was to become a director.
translation.zh: 就是成为导演

translation.en: He had a powerful mentor.
translation.zh: 他拥有大有来头的导师

translation.en: His best friend in Hollywood was an established filmmaker
translation.zh:
他在好莱坞最好的朋友
是一位著名的电影制作人

translation.en: who was his opposite in almost every way:
translation.zh: 他们几乎在所有方面都截然不同

translation.en: William Wyler.
translation.zh: 那就是威廉惠勒

translation.en: They first met when Wyler hired him to write dialogue
translation.zh: （《分裂的家》） 他们的第一次见面 是惠勒请他 为休斯顿父亲主演的电影写对白

translation.en: for a film starring Huston's father.
translation.zh: 为休斯顿父亲主演的电影写对白

translation.en: The two men quickly became inseparable pals.
translation.zh: 这俩人很快就变成形影不离的好友

translation.en: [Spielberg] William Wyler was very, very soft-spoken.
translation.zh: 威廉惠勒说话很轻声细语

translation.en: When he demonstrated that forcefulness of personality
translation.zh: 只有当他在执导的时候

translation.en: was only when he was on the floor, directing.
translation.zh: 他才会表现出强势的个性

translation.en: [William Wyler] I'm demanding, such as the audience is demanding.
translation.zh: 我要求很高 就像观众一样

translation.en: I'm demanding of myself, too.
translation.zh: 我对自己也要求很高

translation.en: I try to get the best out of people, and if it takes a little more work
translation.zh:
我尝试引导出人们最棒的一面
如果那需要多费点力… （威廉惠勒 《大卫佛斯特秀》）

translation.en: and a little more sweat to do it, then that's what we'll have to do.
translation.zh:
…以及多流点汗
我想我们还是得那么做

translation.en: [Spielberg] Which is why they called him 40-take Willy,
translation.zh:
这正是为什么
大家都叫他“40次威力”

translation.en: because he was a perfectionist.
translation.zh: 因为他是完美主义者

translation.en: He was completely in control of when he knew he had gotten it.
translation.zh: 一切由他说了算 拍到他满意为止

translation.en: Willy Wyler's way of directing was tough.
translation.zh: 威廉惠勒的执导方式很严厉 （由贝蒂戴维斯讲述）

translation.en: Believe me, he expected a lot of you,
translation.zh: 相信我 他对你有万般期待

translation.en: and you therefore gave much, much better performances.
translation.zh: 因此会要求你带来更出色的表演

translation.en: Miss Davis, I'm very happy to present to you,
translation.zh: 戴维斯小姐 我很高兴能代表

translation.en: on behalf of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences,
translation.zh: 美国电影艺术与科学学院

translation.en: for the second time, their award for your performance in Jezebel.
translation.zh:
因为你在《红衫泪痕》的演出
第二次颁奖给你

translation.en: [Davis] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Spielberg] I think all directors are actors,
translation.zh: 我认为所有导演都是演员

translation.en: even those that aren't employed to work both sides of the camera.
translation.zh: 即使他们从未出现在镜头前

translation.en: I think when you have to speak to actors, you become an actor.
translation.zh:
我认为当你必须和演员说话时
你就变成了演员

translation.en: And so, I believe that William Wyler was also an actor
translation.zh:
（《呼啸山庄》威廉惠勒） 所以我相信
当威廉惠勒和演员合作时

translation.en: when he was working with his actors.
translation.zh: 他也是演员

translation.en: And I think that's what bonds all of these directors.
translation.zh:
（《孔雀夫人》威廉惠勒） 所以我认为这是
这些导演们的共同之处

translation.en: They were performance directors on top of everything else.
translation.zh: 除了其他角色外 他们还是表演指导

translation.en: [narrator] Wyler needed no education about the war.
translation.zh: 惠勒不需要别人告诉他什么是战争

translation.en: For him, the stakes could not have been higher.
translation.zh: 对他来说 危险再大不过了

translation.en: He had come to America 20 years earlier from Mulhouse,
translation.zh: 他在20年前从米卢斯来到美国

translation.en: a French town that Germany had taken during World War I.
translation.zh:
那是在第一次世界大战
德国所占领的法国城市

translation.en: Now it was being threatened once again.
translation.zh: 而现在又再次受到威胁 （米卢斯）

translation.en: Originally, I was supposed to take over my father's business.
translation.zh: 我原本该接管我爸爸的事业

translation.en: My father was a merchant in Mulhouse, had a nice store.
translation.zh:
（由威廉惠勒讲述） 我爸爸是商人
他在米卢斯开了家很棒的店

translation.en: I was not keen about it, but I had no other prospects.
translation.zh: 我并不感兴趣 但我没其他志向

translation.en: [narrator] Wyler was sponsored by a distant relative
translation.zh: 惠勒受到恰好在经营

translation.zh: 最具影响力的导演的名声

translation.zh:
分别是《归途路迢迢》和

translation.zh:
《愤怒的葡萄》是一部

translation.en: about the nature of society.
translation.zh: 它探讨的是社会本质

translation.zh: 也许就像凯西说的

translation.zh: 一个人的灵魂不属于自己

translation.zh: 只是…大灵魂里的一小部分而已

translation.zh: 这个属于所有人的大灵魂

translation.zh:
你可以看到福特的电影
越来越接近现实

translation.zh: 在《归途路迢迢》中

translation.zh: 你可以看到挪威战败的消息

translation.zh: 采用这么特定和当代的元素

translation.zh:
我是说基本上等于
直接从那天的报纸取材

translation.zh: （德国军队攻击挪威） 他是故意这么做的 这是有意的选择

translation.zh: 我拍摄电影最有趣的经历之一…

translation.zh:
我拍摄电影最有趣的经历之一… （由约翰福特讲述） …是在拍尤金奥尼尔的
《归途路迢迢》的时候

translation.zh: 我从不知道在当时那几个月里

translation.zh: 我可能会遭到同一种轰炸机的空袭

translation.zh:
到了那时 在电影里加入战争元素
对福特来说已经不够了

translation.zh: 他请求海军成立官方的海军摄影部队

translation.zh: 称作野战摄影队

translation.zh: 他招募摄影师、音控师和剪辑师

translation.zh: 所有他在日后会带去美国政府的元素

translation.zh:
野战摄影队成员
一个礼拜在福斯停车场见一次

translation.zh: 并用道具和拍戏用的军装来训练

translation.zh:
这个队伍很快被指定为
海军后备军的一部分

translation.en: The whole idea of John Ford in uniform, which he was obsessed by, incidentally,
translation.zh:
约翰福特穿上军服的这件事…
顺带一提 他对此很迷恋

translation.en: the idea of John Ford, of all people, fitting into a Navy hierarchy...
translation.zh: 约翰福特让所有人都加入海军

translation.en: It's that divided personality.
translation.zh: 这源于他分裂的个性

translation.en: He yearned to be that disciplined man of rectitude.
translation.zh: 他渴望成为纪律严明、刚正不阿的人

translation.en: But it was at odds with the rebel outsider.
translation.zh: 但这会与叛逆的局外人发生矛盾

translation.en: Behind the sort of hard drinking,
translation.zh: 在他酗酒的背后

translation.en: he was a highly attuned thinker and artist,
translation.zh: 他是极为敏感的思想家和艺术家

translation.en: who could see that the world was collapsing.
translation.zh: 他能看得出来世界正在崩溃

translation.en: [narrator] Ford received his third Best Director nomination that year
translation.zh: 福特那年以《愤怒的葡萄》

translation.zh: 第三次得到最佳导演奖提名

translation.en: William Wyler was also nominated for the third time
translation.zh: 威廉惠勒也以《香笺泪》

translation.zh: 获得第三次提名

translation.en: [Spielberg] All of Wyler's movies before the war,
translation.zh: 惠勒在战争以前所拍的电影

translation.en: they were like sitting down with a good book.
translation.zh: 都像在读一本好书一样

translation.en: But they weren't relevant to the affairs of the world in any way.
translation.zh: （《香笺泪》威廉惠勒） 但内容和国际事务完全无关

translation.en: [man] Next, the awards.
translation.zh: 接下来 得奖人是…

translation.en: [Spielberg] Frank Capra brought the nominees
translation.zh: 弗兰克卡普拉那晚

translation.en: that were in attendance at the Oscars that night onto stage,
translation.zh:
将所有参加奥斯卡的被提名人
都叫上台

translation.en: which was kind of weird.
translation.zh: 而这有点奇怪

translation.en: And then, while they were standing there, he gave the award to John Ford,
translation.zh:
然后当他们都站在那里时
他宣布获奖者是约翰福特

translation.en: who never even showed up, because Ford was out fishing on his boat.
translation.zh:
他甚至没参加颁奖典礼
因为他在自己的船上钓鱼

translation.en: [narrator] Wyler, once again, went home empty-handed.
translation.zh: 惠勒又一次两手空空地回家了

translation.en: [man] The Motion Picture Academy of Arts and Sciences
translation.zh: 美国电影艺术与科学学院

translation.en: hears an inspiring radio message
translation.zh: 接到了这条鼓舞人心的无线电讯息

translation.en: direct from the president in the White House.
translation.zh: 是由总统直接从白宫发出的

translation.en: We have seen the American motion picture become foremost in all the world.
translation.zh: 我们看到美国电影在全球出类拔萃

translation.en: We've seen it reflect our civilization throughout the rest of the world.
translation.zh:
我们看到电影反映出
世界其他地方的文明

translation.en: The aims and the aspirations and the ideals of a free people
translation.zh: 包括目标、抱负和人民自由

translation.en: and of freedom itself.
translation.zh: 与自由本身的想法

translation.zh:
1941年6月
纳粹德国开始大举入侵苏联

translation.en: in a dramatic escalation of the war.
translation.zh: 战争急剧升级

translation.en: [man] These are the first motion pictures of the Nazi-Soviet war.
translation.zh: 这些是关于德苏战争的 第一批影片 公映于莫斯科

translation.en: Film released by Moscow.
translation.zh: 第一批影片 公映于莫斯科

translation.en: The Red Army in action.
translation.zh: 《战斗中的红军》

translation.en: The Germans drive deep into Russia.
translation.zh: 德军深入苏联

translation.en: Stalin has ordered the destruction of everything in their path.
translation.zh: 斯大林下令消灭所有敌军

translation.en: [narrator] A month later, Warner Bros. released Sergeant York.
translation.zh:
一个月后
华纳兄弟上映了《约克军曹》

translation.en: Huston was one of the writers of the film,
translation.zh: 休斯顿是电影的编剧之一

translation.en: a true story about a decorated hero in World War I.
translation.zh:
这是关于在第一次世界大战
受表彰英雄的真实故事

translation.en: [Coppola] It's the story of, essentially, a man who was a conscientious objector,
translation.zh:
基本上故事内容
是一名拒绝参战的男人

translation.en: who believes that the Bible says that we should not kill,
translation.zh:
他相信《圣经》上所说的
人类不该杀生

translation.en: and he does not want to kill.
translation.zh: 所以他不想要杀人

translation.en: Of course, he turns out to be the most effective soldier.
translation.zh: 当然 结果他成为最有战力的军人

translation.en: He takes out an entire German gun emplacement.
translation.zh: 他端掉了德军的一个机枪炮台 （《约克军曹》霍华德霍克斯）

translation.en: Them guns was killing hundreds, maybe thousands,
translation.zh:
他们的枪杀死了数百人
甚至是数千人

translation.en: and there weren't nothin' anybody could do but to stop them guns.
translation.zh:
除了阻止他们杀人以外
没有其他方法了

translation.en: [Coppola] The movie slowly built its premise
translation.zh: 电影慢慢建立其假设

translation.en: that someone who could be so against killing
translation.zh: 某个那么反对杀生的人

translation.en: could ultimately also be a very effective soldier
translation.zh: 最终也能成为最有战力的军人

translation.en: if the idea behind it could make sense to him.
translation.zh:
如果这背后的意义
对他来说有道理的话

translation.en: [narrator] Sergeant York became the highest-grossing film of 1941.
translation.zh:
《约克军曹》
成为1941年最卖座的电影

translation.en: Its runaway success rankled the isolationists in Washington,
translation.zh:
（《约克军曹》成为最卖座的电影） 电影巨大的成功
惹怒了华盛顿的孤立主义者

translation.en: and they decided the time was right to go after Hollywood.
translation.zh: 他们认为是时候对好莱坞采取行动了

translation.en: Senator Gerald Nye claimed
translation.zh: 杰拉德奈参议员宣称电影公司

translation.zh: 杰拉德奈参议员宣称电影公司 与罗斯福政府勾结

translation.en: to make pro-war propaganda, and he called hearings.
translation.zh:
拍摄战争宣传电影
并为此召开了听证会 （奈抨击电影制作人鼓吹战争）

translation.en: Studio heads and filmmakers were summoned to testify before Congress.
translation.zh:
（电影调查员质问《大独裁者》） 电影公司老板和制作人
受到传唤 去国会作证

translation.en: In Harry Warner's testimony, he stated,
translation.zh: 在哈里华纳的证词中 他表示

translation.en: "In truth, the only sin of which Warner Bros. is guilty
translation.zh: “事实上华纳兄弟唯一的所谓罪行

translation.en: is that of accurately recording on the screen the world as it is."
translation.zh:
就是在大银幕上
真实呈现这世界的模样”

translation.en: [man] Incendiary bombs and high explosives
translation.zh: 燃烧弹和烈性炸药从天而降

translation.en: rained down on every part of the British capital indiscriminately.
translation.zh: 不加区别地丢在英国首都的所有地方

translation.en: Chungking, a mass of flaming ruins
translation.zh: （轰炸使重庆沦为火海） 重庆在经历最可怕的空袭后

translation.en: after one of the most frightful of air raids,
translation.zh: 沦为烈焰中的废墟

translation.en: reminding us grimly that, while Europe holds the headlines,
translation.zh:
这无情地提醒我们
欧洲登上头条的同时

translation.en: the China war drags on with unending tragedy.
translation.zh:
中国的战争仍持续
发生着无止境的悲剧

translation.en: Yet, the stubborn defense against Japan goes on.
translation.zh: 但他们仍在顽强抵抗日本的侵犯

translation.en: I got a call from my agent.
translation.zh: 我接到了经纪人的电话

translation.en: He wanted to see me about a picture called Mrs. Miniver.
translation.zh:
他想跟我谈谈一部叫做
《忠勇之家》的电影

translation.en: I didn't know anything about it.
translation.zh: 我对此全然不知情 （由威廉惠勒讲述）

translation.en: He said it's about England at war.
translation.zh: 他说是关于战争时的英国

translation.en: Oh, well, I was interested right away.
translation.zh: 这马上勾起了我的兴趣

translation.en: [Spielberg] I really think that he began to try to find a cause.
translation.zh: 我认为他开始试图寻找一个目标

translation.en: And I think his first cause as a filmmaker was Mrs. Miniver.
translation.zh:
我想他作为电影制作人的
第一个目标就是《忠勇之家》

translation.en: He really told the story of solidarity and strength.
translation.zh: 他在讲述团结和力量的故事

translation.en: Greer Garson and Walter Pidgeon,
translation.zh: 葛丽嘉森和沃尔特皮金

translation.en: and the power of that marriage and that family,
translation.zh: 以及那段婚姻与家族的力量

translation.en: that they were unshakeable.
translation.zh: 他们毫不动摇

translation.en: It just was something that we want to live up to ourselves.
translation.zh: 那是我们会想在生活中实践的东西

translation.en: And I think he knew that he could make a contribution.
translation.zh: 我认为他知道他能做出贡献

translation.en: I think Wyler knew that he was strong enough in his self-confidence
translation.zh:
我认为惠勒知道
他对自己有足够的信心

translation.en: to know that he could tell a story about the real war
translation.zh: 他可以讲述真实战争的故事

translation.en: and have a tremendous impact with that story stateside.
translation.zh: 并能以这故事为美国带来巨大的影响

translation.en: There was a scene with a German pilot who was shot down over England,
translation.zh:
（由威廉惠勒讲述） 有一幕是一位德国飞行员
被击落在英国

translation.en: and he was caught by Mrs. Miniver somehow.
translation.zh: 而他意外被米尼弗太太发现

translation.en: And I said, "This man has got to be one of Mr. Göring's little monsters."
translation.zh:
我说：“这家伙一定是
戈林手下的小恶魔”

translation.zh: 我接到电话 要我去见路易梅尔

translation.en: He said, "We're glad to have you here with us,
translation.zh: 他说：“我们很高兴能邀请到你

translation.en: and we're glad you're making this picture,
translation.zh: 我们也很高兴你能担任电影导演

translation.en: but you must remember one thing:
translation.zh: 不过请务必记得一件事

translation.en: we are not making a hate picture.
translation.zh: 我们不是要制作仇恨电影

translation.en: We don't hate anybody. We're not in the war."
translation.zh:
我们不憎恨任何人
我们没有参加这场战争”

translation.en: I said, "Mr. Mayer, you know what's going on in the world.
translation.zh:
我说：“梅尔先生
你知道这世界正在发生什么事吗？

translation.en: I mean, do you know what's going on?"
translation.zh: 我是说 你知道目前的局势吗？”

translation.en: He said, "Yes, I know. But look, we have stockholders.
translation.zh:
他说：“是的 我知道
不过我们还有股东

translation.en: You know, we cannot satisfy our own personal feelings."
translation.zh: 我们不能只满足自身感受”

translation.en: I said, "Look, Mr. Mayer, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我说：“听着 梅尔先生 我很抱歉

translation.en: I have one German in this picture.
translation.zh:
这部电影里只有一个德国人
如果有好几个德国人

translation.en: If I had several Germans, I wouldn't mind having one nice, friendly chap.
translation.zh:
这部电影里只有一个德国人
如果有好几个德国人 我不介意其中有一个善良亲切的家伙

translation.en: But I've only got one, and if I make this film,
translation.zh:
但这部里只有一个
如果我要拍这部电影

translation.en: this one German is going to be one of Mr. Göring's little monsters
translation.zh:
这个德国人
就一定得是戈林手下的恶魔

translation.en: who wants to destroy the world and kill all the Jews,
translation.zh: 他想摧毁全世界 杀光所有犹太人

translation.en: and so on and so forth.
translation.zh: 诸如此类的事

translation.en: And otherwise, I don't make the film."
translation.zh: 否则我就不拍这电影了”

translation.en: [Roosevelt] December 7, 1941:
a date which will live in infamy.
translation.zh: 这天将永远成为国耻之日

translation.en: I ask that the Congress declare
translation.zh: 我要求国会宣布

translation.en: that, since the unprovoked and dastardly attack by Japan,
translation.zh: 既然日本无端对我国进行卑鄙的进攻

translation.en: a state of war has existed
translation.zh: 美国与日本帝国之间

translation.en: between the United States and the Japanese Empire.
translation.zh: 已进入战争状态

translation.en: About halfway through making Mrs. Miniver...
translation.zh: （德国和意大利对我国宣战） 大约拍摄《忠勇之家》到一半时

translation.en: Pearl Harbor.
translation.zh: 发生了珍珠港事件

translation.en: Germany declares war on us.
translation.zh: 德国向我们宣战

translation.en: We didn't even have to declare war on them.
translation.zh: 我们甚至不需要对他们宣战

translation.en: We declared war on Japan, Germany declares war on us.
translation.zh: 我们向日本宣战 德国则向我们宣战

translation.en: I get a call from Mr. Mayer.
translation.zh: 我接到梅尔先生的电话

translation.en: "I've been thinking a lot about what you said."
translation.zh: “我一直在想你说的话”

translation.en: He said, "You know, maybe you were right.
translation.zh: 他说：“也许你是对的

translation.en: You go ahead and do the way you want it.
translation.zh: 你就以你想要的方式做吧

translation.en: It's okay for now. All right."
translation.zh: 现在没事了 好了”

translation.en: He'd been giving it a lot of thought.
translation.zh: 他想了很久

translation.en: Rotterdam we destroy in two hours.
translation.zh: 我们两小时内就摧毁了鹿特丹

translation.en: That's thousands killed. Innocent--
translation.zh: 那是数千人的性命 无辜…

translation.en: -Not innocent! They were against us! -Women and children!
translation.zh:
-一点也不无辜！他们是敌人
-其中有女人和小孩！

translation.en: Thirty-thousand in two hours.
translation.zh: 两小时内夺走了三万人的性命

translation.en: And we will do the same thing here!
translation.zh: 我们也会在这做同样的事！

translation.en: And at the end of Mrs. Miniver,
translation.zh: 在《忠勇之家》的结尾

translation.en: with the pullback that reveals the gutted church...
translation.zh: 镜头后撤 在一个被毁坏的教堂内

translation.en: Wyler's talking directly to audiences,
translation.zh: 惠勒直接向观众喊话

translation.en: talking directly to the British audiences,
translation.zh: 直接向英国观众喊话

translation.en: talking directly to the American audiences.
translation.zh: 直接向美国观众喊话

translation.en: It just seemed like a declaration of commitment,
translation.zh: 那就像在宣告决心

translation.en: that we're all in this together, and we're going to fight until we win.
translation.zh:
我们会团结一心
我们会抗争到底 直到获得胜利

translation.en: And it was a very beautifully-written speech.
translation.zh: 那场演讲写得非常精彩

translation.en: This is the people's war. It is our war.
translation.zh: 这是人民的战争 这是我们的战争

translation.en: We are the fighters. Fight it, then.
translation.zh: 我们就是战士 所以战斗吧！

translation.en: Fight it with all that is in us.
translation.zh: 我们要竭尽全力去战斗

translation.en: And may God defend the right.
translation.zh: 上帝会保佑正义的一方

translation.en: If you can make a film that has something to say...
translation.zh:
如果你能制作一部
有特殊意义的电影…

translation.en: ...entertaining, of course, is the main purpose of it,
translation.zh: …当然 娱乐是主要目的

translation.en: but if film can contribute something to the social conscience of your time,
translation.zh:
但如果电影
能对当时的社会良心有所贡献

translation.en: then it becomes a source of great satisfaction.
translation.zh: 那就会变成令人喜悦的事

translation.en: [Spielberg] That was his first contribution to the war effort.
translation.zh: 那是他对战争的首次贡献

translation.en: [Greengrass] For each of those five filmmakers,
translation.zh: 对这五位导演来说

translation.en: they wanted to respond
translation.zh: 他们如同数以百万的

translation.en: as so many millions of men and women responded.
translation.zh: 男人和女人一样想要做出回应

translation.en: They chose to serve.
translation.zh: 他们选择了服役

translation.en: [man] Overnight, America's heavy industry has converted
translation.zh: 一夜之间 美国重工业已转变为

translation.zh: 全天候的战争生产业

translation.zh: 最后好莱坞有三分之一的男性入伍

translation.zh: （好莱坞对自身进行估量） 但遭受袭击后的前几天

translation.zh: 电影业不确定自身该担任的角色 （电影公司全数为国助战）

translation.zh: 像往常一样工作似乎不可能

translation.zh: 工作时数缩短 夜生活也是一样
